'''The Forge Realm's Temper: Game of Wits''' is a PvE event gamemode for [[Genius Invokation TCG]] in [[Version 4.0]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* Available throughout the entirety of Version 4.0 (2023-08-16 11:00 - 2023-08-27 05:59)

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 32 or above
* Complete [[Archon Quest]] [[Prologue]]: Act III "[[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]]"
* Complete the [[World Quest]] "[[Battlefield of Dice, Cats, and Cards]]"

===Summary=== 
* After the event starts, Travelers can go to Prince at The Cat's Tail to select stages to challenge.
* This event includes 4 stages and each stage will have special victory and defeat conditions. Some stages also have specific rules related to the victory and defeat conditions.
* Fully utilize the special rules and avoid the conditions for defeat to complete these stage challenges.
* Complete stage challenges to obtain the corresponding rewards.

Special defeat condition: If you have not defeated all of your opponents' characters by the end of the first round, you lose the duel.<br>At the start of the first round, you gain an additional 2 Omni Element Dice.<br>After an opponent's character is defeated or one of your characters uses an Elemental Burst: Gain 3 Omni Element Dice, and draw 1 card, and you will be able to act again after the current action is completed.
|}

===II - Hot Potato===
'''Challenge Rewards'''

!Reward

|Achieve Victory in the stage "Hot Potato"
|{{Card|Lucky Coin|2,000}}

;Opposing Lineup
{{TCG Card List|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Skirmisher - Hydrogunner Legionnaire;Fatui Skirmisher - Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Skirmisher - Electrohammer Vanguard}}

{| class="article-table"
!'''Special Rules'''
|-
| 
At the start of the Action Phase: The player that goes first will generate a "Hot Potato."<br>Special defeat condition: If the "Hot Potato" is on your side when the End Phase is calculated, you immediately lose the duel.<br>The "Hot Potato" will switch to the other player's side each time a Character on their side uses a Skill, and the "Hot Potato" will gain 1 point of "Piping Hot." (Max 4 stacks).<br>End Phase: Remove the "Hot Potato," and deal 2 Physical DMG to the Active Character of the player whose side of the field the Hot Potato is on. This damage is increased by 1 for each point of "Piping Hot" accumulated.
|}
